Hydroelectric Power.Description: Hydroelectric power relies on the flow of water to generate electricity.
Hydroelectric power uses turbines to convert the energy of flowing water into mechanical energy.
Hydroelectric power requires the construction of dams to create reservoirs and control the flow of water.
Hydroelectric power produces electricity by harnessing the energy of flowing water.
